Name: Garage Drummer VR
About the game: Bringing a full kit of drums to the masses with HTC Vive VR! Practice your drum skills in your house without waking the neighbors. A fun and useful simulation in a tranquil garage on the beach. Rock out to your own music or start a band with friends because you now have a drum kit! *Beautiful Unreal 4 graphics *Full drum kit with sampled sounds *motion control based drumming with accurate hit detection +Alot cheaper than a real garage and drum kit
